title: Malawi: the women
creator_credit: Churchill Films, Dimension Films and Max Reid
brief_description: The varying lifestyles of Malawian women are revealed through sequences showing them at work in a village, a city, and the suburbs of a city. Two women voice their views about their respective lives and these reflect the concerns of many at the contrasts of village and city life.
creator_credit_for_label: Churchill Films, Dimension Films and Max Reid
